abstract: France opens Tehran trade office following visit by French corporations hoping to do business in Iran after nuclear accord lifted most sanctions; eagerness of international business to enter market is complicated by unilateral financial sanctions against Iran by United States.
lead_paragraph: The opening leads the charge of European countries angling for a share of the Iranian market since the July nuclear agreement.

headline.main: France Opens Trade Office in Iran
headline.print_headline: France, Eager to Restore Ties, Opens a Trade Office in Iran

snippet: The opening leads the charge of European countries angling for a share of the Iranian market since the July nuclear agreement.
